xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/512184-A.W. A Portrait of Apichatpong Weerasethakul 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ygjU1bJSvIgtDpLBVariuG3ZxAZ.jpg Canadian actor and filmmaker Connor Jessup (Closet Monster, Falling Skies) profiles Apichatpong Weerasethakul, a maverick of Thai cinema who explores the slippery nature of time and consciousness with a sublimely idiosyncratic, often surreal approach to film form. A.W. A Portrait of Apichatpong Weerasethakul
